dict.acceptation: 暂时的停顿；犹豫；（诗中）节奏的停顿；[乐]延长号；
暂停，中止；逗留，停滞；（按暂停键）暂停放音；犹豫；

sent.orig: Pause: stop for a short time.
The pause also lets people laugh.
sent.trans: 停顿本身就令人们发笑。

sent.orig: An awkward pause followed his remark.
sent.trans: 他讲了话，接着是一片让人尴尬的沉寂。

sent.orig: After a pause he continued his story.
sent.trans: 停顿一下之后他继续说他的。

sent.orig: A more robust American posture was called for, to give the Kremlin pause.
sent.trans: 要遏制克里姆林宫，美国就得摆出更坚定的姿态。
